<<<<<<< HEAD
To the Maiestie of King Iames A gratulatorie poem by Michaell Drayton. Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
[14] p., plate
Printed by Iames Roberts, for T. M[an] and H. L[ownes], At London : 1603.
Publishers' names from STC. Signatures: A-B⁴ (-A1). The last leaf is blank. In this first state "To the reader" on B3r begins "For the truth .."; the first roundel of the genealogical table has "Soueraygne". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
To the Maiestie of King Iames A gratulatorie poem by Michaell Drayton. Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
[14] p., plate
Printed by Iames Roberts, for T. M[an] and H. L[ownes], At London : 1603.
Publishers' names from STC. Signatures: A-B⁴ (-A1). The last leaf is blank. In this first state "To the reader" on B3r begins "For the truth .."; the first roundel of the genealogical table has "Soueraygne". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
H. L[ownes]
T. M[an]
Iames Roberts
